data.name: Captcha Kills
data.detailed_description: It's the modern day Turing Test where players pretend to be AI to deceive others into believing they aren't human. Voices are disguised and players are given rounds to identify and eliminate others who they suspect are human. The game is built to test your ability at deceiving others into believing you aren't human and your ability to tell the difference between AI and Human. It’s a race to identify the other sentient beings before you get identified first. The game is cross-platform enabled, connecting virtual reality with flatscreen in a seamless fashion.
data.about_the_game: It's the modern day Turing Test where players pretend to be AI to deceive others into believing they aren't human. Voices are disguised and players are given rounds to identify and eliminate others who they suspect are human. The game is built to test your ability at deceiving others into believing you aren't human and your ability to tell the difference between AI and Human. It’s a race to identify the other sentient beings before you get identified first. The game is cross-platform enabled, connecting virtual reality with flatscreen in a seamless fashion.
data.short_description: A crossover between Among Us and the Turing Test. In this multiplayer battle royale, you deceive others into believing you are artificial intelligence and not human. Hide amongst the AI, eliminate players you believe are human, and be the last person standing to win.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 or AMD equivalent
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 660 or AMD Radeon HD 7950
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 3 GB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: macOs 11.4 or higher
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4590 / AMD FX 8350
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 970 / AMD Radeon R9 290
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
